content: Write a paragraph with every word starting with the letter 'm'.

Magnificent mountains majestically marched towards the mysterious misty horizon. Majestic monkeys merrily moved amidst the magnificent mango trees, munching on mature, mouthwatering fruits. The meandering river murmured melodious melodies, attracting multitudes of mesmerized murmuration of starlings. Nearby, a modest mansion mirrored the magnificent scenery, its myriad mirrors multiplying the magic of the mesmerizing landscape. Minutes morphed into hours as the sun migrated towards the west, muting its radiance and merging into the twilight's embrace.
